textBox.richText: We are rebooting this site! We have changed our name, are redesigning the logo, and setting up new fundraisers. We are still the same organization - working to help support the efforts of the Children’s Rescue Mission, health initiatives and job-training for widows in Kisumu, Kenya. Our goal is still to be a transparent organization, so you can see how decisions are made and how money is used. We will continue to post photo updates from Kenya.
